transcript:
and snatching the shawl from the footman, whom he even pushed aside, he began wrapping it round the princess. Either from awkwardness or intentionally (no one could have said which) after the shawl had been adjusted he kept his arm around her for a long time, as though embracing her. 
Still smiling, she gracefully moved away, 
IS 
turning and glancing at her husband. Prince Andrew's eyes were closed, so weary and sleepy did he seem. 
"Are you ready?" he asked his wife, look- ing past her
